description: The Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch with M2 Max chip offers unparalleled power and performance for creative professionals. Equipped with a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, it delivers vibrant colors and true blacks for accurate design work. With up to 64GB of unified memory and 8TB SSD storage, it handles intensive workflows effortlessly. Enjoy long battery life, a premium keyboard, and advanced thermal design.

The Apple MacBook Air 15-inch with M2 chip is the perfect combination of portability and power. It features a sleek, lightweight design ideal for students and professionals on the go. The Retina display offers sharp images and vibrant colors. With up to 18 hours of battery life, fast SSD storage, and silent fanless architecture, it is ready to support your daily productivity and creativity needs.

Experience pro-level performance with the Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch featuring the M1 Pro chip. This laptop boasts a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology for smoother visuals. It offers outstanding power efficiency and lightning-fast performance, making it ideal for video editing, coding, and multitasking. Long battery life and an advanced cooling system keep you working uninterrupted.

The MacBook Air 13-inch with Apple’s M1 chip revolutionizes thin and light laptops. Its fanless design ensures silent operation, while the powerful CPU and GPU deliver fast performance for everyday tasks and creative projects. The Retina display is bright and colorful, and the laptop provides excellent battery life, perfect for users who prioritize mobility and all-day productivity.

This 13-inch MacBook Pro with the M2 chip offers a great balance of portability and power for professionals on the move. Featuring the Magic Keyboard and Retina display, it supports intensive workloads like photo and video editing with smooth performance. The Touch Bar adds quick access to controls and shortcuts, while the battery supports long work sessions.

Designed for heavy workloads, the MacBook Pro 16-inch with M1 Max chip delivers extraordinary CPU and GPU performance. It features a stunning 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with excellent color accuracy. With up to 64GB memory and fast SSD storage, it’s perfect for 3D rendering, software development, and video production. Advanced cooling ensures consistent performance during extended use.

The 2020 MacBook Air powered by the Apple M1 chip is known for exceptional performance and efficiency in a slim design. It offers a high-resolution Retina display and supports up to 16GB of memory. This model is ideal for students and professionals who want a dependable, lightweight machine for everyday computing and multimedia.

The MacBook Pro 14-inch equipped with the M2 Pro chip is tailored for demanding professional tasks, offering a Liquid Retina XDR display and ProMotion technology. It balances power efficiency with top-tier performance and includes a versatile range of ports. Perfect for video editors, developers, and designers who need reliability and speed on the go.

The 2022 MacBook Air with the M2 chip features a fresh design with a bigger 13.6-inch Retina display, improved performance, and battery life. This model offers MagSafe charging, better speakers, and an upgraded 1080p webcam, making it ideal for both everyday productivity and creative work in a compact form factor.

The MacBook Pro 13-inch with M1 Pro chip brings enhanced CPU and GPU power, along with an extended battery life and advanced cooling system. It features the Retina display and is ideal for professionals requiring strong performance in a portable size. Perfect for multitasking, software development, and creative projects that demand reliability and speed.

The HP Envy 13 is a sleek and ultra-portable laptop designed for creators and professionals. Featuring a vibrant 13.3-inch 4K display, the latest Intel Core i7 processor, and fast SSD storage, it offers powerful performance and excellent battery life in a lightweight metal chassis.

HP Envy x360 15 is a powerful 2-in-1 convertible laptop equipped with AMD Ryzen 7 processors and a stunning touch-enabled display. It is designed to provide excellent multitasking and creative capabilities in a durable metal build with Bang & Olufsen audio for an immersive experience.

The HP Dragonfly G3 is an ultra-lightweight business laptop weighing under 1 kg, offering powerful Intel Evo platform performance. It includes a 13.5-inch 3:2 display, advanced security features, and excellent battery life, making it perfect for executives who prioritize mobility without sacrificing power.

HP Dragonfly Folio is a premium business convertible laptop with a leather-inspired finish and ultra-thin design. It features a 13.5-inch touchscreen, stylus support, and enterprise-grade security, perfect for professionals looking for style, performance, and security in one elegant device.

The HP EliteBook 840 G9 is a powerful business laptop combining strong security features with a durable chassis. With a 14-inch Full HD display and 12th Gen Intel Core processors, it delivers reliable performance and long battery life, ideal for on-the-go professionals and corporate environments.

The HP EliteBook x360 1040 G9 is a versatile premium business convertible with a 14-inch touchscreen and 360-degree hinge. Equipped with powerful Intel processors and collaboration tools, it offers flexibility, security, and performance for executives who need to work efficiently in any environment.

The HP ProBook 450 G9 is a budget-friendly business laptop offering a solid balance of performance and value. With a 15.6-inch display, Intel Core i5/i7 processors, and a sturdy chassis, it’s perfect for small and medium-sized businesses requiring reliable productivity tools.

HP ProBook 635 Aero offers AMD Ryzen processor power packed in a lightweight, durable chassis. It boasts impressive battery life and strong security features, making it ideal for mobile professionals who need dependable performance and portability without compromise.

The HP Elite Dragonfly Max is a top-tier business laptop featuring AI noise cancellation, 5G connectivity, and a vivid 13.5-inch display. Designed for professionals working remotely, it offers long battery life and enhanced collaboration capabilities for seamless productivity anywhere.

The HP ProBook x360 435 G8 is a flexible 2-in-1 laptop powered by AMD Ryzen processors. Its 13.3-inch touch display and convertible design make it ideal for teamwork and presentations, while security features ensure data safety for business environments.

The Dell XPS 13 Plus offers a futuristic design with a seamless glass touch function row and edge-to-edge 13.4-inch OLED display. Powered by 12th Gen Intel Core processors, this laptop is ideal for professionals and creatives seeking top-tier performance in a compact, stylish body.

The Dell Latitude 7420 is a premium business laptop built for durability and security. Featuring a 14-inch Full HD display and 11th Gen Intel Core processors, it delivers excellent performance with long battery life and enterprise-grade security features ideal for professionals.

The Dell G15 is a budget-friendly gaming laptop with powerful hardware including an Intel Core i7 processor and NVIDIA RTX 3050 graphics. With a 15.6-inch Full HD display and effective thermal cooling, it offers smooth gameplay and reliable performance for gamers on a budget.

The Dell Latitude 9520 is an enterprise-class laptop built for performance and security. It features a 15-inch Full HD display, 11th Gen Intel Core processors, and advanced security solutions. Its premium chassis and long battery life make it ideal for demanding business environments.

The Dell Precision 5570 is a mobile workstation designed for professionals in CAD and 3D design. Featuring a 15.6-inch 4K UHD display and Intel Xeon processors, it offers high-end graphics performance and reliability for demanding creative and engineering tasks.

The Dell Inspiron 16 Plus offers a large 16-inch 3K display and powerful 11th Gen Intel Core processors. It’s perfect for users needing a big screen and strong multitasking capabilities for creative work and entertainment, all within a stylish, modern chassis.

The Asus Vivobook 15 OLED (M513IA) delivers stunning visual quality with its 15.6-inch Full HD OLED display, perfect for content creators and media enthusiasts. Powered by AMD Ryzen 7 5800H and 16GB RAM, it handles multitasking effortlessly. A fast 512GB SSD, ergonomic keyboard, and lightweight chassis make it ideal for both work and entertainment on the go.

The Asus Vivobook Flip 14 (TP470EA) is a versatile 2-in-1 convertible laptop with a responsive touch screen and stylus support. Powered by Intel Core i5-1135G7, it offers solid performance for work, study, and creative projects. The 360-degree hinge, lightweight design, and long battery life make it ideal for flexible on-the-go usage.

The Asus Vivobook 15X OLED (M1504QA) is a creative-focused laptop featuring a 15.6-inch 2.8K OLED display, making it ideal for multimedia editing and vibrant visuals. Equipped with AMD Ryzen 7 6800H and 16GB RAM, it provides reliable performance for creators and students alike. Its light build and long battery life ensure productivity on the move.

The Surface Book 3 13.5-inch combines the power of a high-performance laptop with the versatility of a detachable tablet. With Intel Core i7, up to NVIDIA GTX 1650 Max‑Q graphics, and all-day battery life, it handles creative workflows like photo editing, coding, and light gaming effortlessly. The PixelSense touchscreen is vivid and responsive, and the hinge allows easy transition between laptop and tablet modes.

The Surface Book 3 15-inch is designed for power users who need professional-grade performance. Sporting Intel Core i7 and NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti, it excels at 3D rendering, video editing, and other GPU-intensive tasks. This detachable laptop delivers tablet convenience with pen support and long battery life, while its sturdy build ensures reliability in various work environments.

The highest-performance Surface Book 3 features Intel Core i7 and NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti Max‑Q, alongside 32GB RAM and 2TB SSD storage. Built for professional creative workflows such as video editing, 3D rendering, and graphic design, its detachable form factor and impressive battery life make it a powerful yet flexible studio device.

The mid-spec Surface Book 3 model offers a solid blend of power and portability with Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and NVIDIA GTX 1650. The detachable design provides flexibility for tablet usage, and the bright PixelSense display is great for drawing, presentations, or watching HD video content anywhere.

This top-tier Surface Book 3 model includes Intel Core i7, NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti Max‑Q, 32GB RAM, and 2TB SSD. Built for professionals who need maximum performance in a portable design, it excels in video editing, 3D modeling, and graphic design. The detachable tablet mode and precise pen input enhance creative workflows.

Designed for creative professionals, the ViewFinity S9 is a 5K monitor that delivers outstanding color accuracy and resolution. It's a direct competitor to high-end professional displays.

description: The compact way to add big space. Plug in the FIT Plus to get secondary, upgraded storage for your devices, then leave it in to easily carry more files. It stays out of your way and is so quick it keeps files at the ready.
specification: Seamless fit for laptops, smart TVs and cars

description: One drive to store it all. The DUO Plus is a Type-C drive with a super-useful Type-A adapter. Intuitively designed with a single piece cap that protects the connector and doubles as a key loop.
specification: USB Type-C with included Type-A adapter

description: The PNY Turbo Attache 3 is built for speed and convenience. It's the perfect solution for easily storing and quickly transferring all your large documents, high-resolution photos, HD videos, and more.
specification: USB 3.0, up to 10x faster than USB 2.0

product_title: PNY Pro Elite V2 256GB USB 3.2 Gen 1
description: The PNY Pro Elite V2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Flash Drive is the next generation in mobile storage. It offers read speeds of up to 400MB/s, making it one of the fastest USB-A flash drives from PNY.

The PNY Elite-X Fit USB 3.1 Flash Drive is a compact, plug-in solution for your on-the-go storage needs. Its micro-sized design is perfect for use with laptops, car stereos, and more without getting in the way.
specification: Includes a translucent cap to protect the connector

product_title: PNY Duo Link 128GB USB 3.1 Type-C OTG
description: PNY DUO LINK is a 2-in-1 USB 3.1 Type-C flash drive that connects to your Android device and computer to quickly and easily transfer files. Free up space on your phone or tablet in an instant.

Your files are important – that’s why you’re taking them with you. Flash Survivor Stealth is built to protect them. The anodized, aircraft-grade aluminum housing is waterproof to 200 meters, vibration-resistant, and shock-resistant.
The Flash Voyager GTX puts SSD performance in your pocket, with read speeds up to 440MB/s. It is universally compatible with Windows, macOS and Linux with no driver installation necessary.
specification: Rugged zinc alloy housing with aluminum accents
Optimized for USB 3.1 and UAS (USB Attached SCSI) protocol

description: Keep your personal files safe with the Flash Padlock 3. It features 256-bit AES hardware encryption and a built-in PIN pad for simple authentication. The ruggedized rubber housing helps protect it from the elements.

A rugged and durable portable SSD designed for outdoor content creators. The T7 Shield is IP65-rated for water and dust resistance and features a rubberized exterior for up to 3-meter drop protection, all while delivering super-fast speeds.
specification: Dynamic Thermal Guard to control heat

description: Samsung's flagship portable SSD, offering maximum speed for pro creators. With USB 3.2 Gen 2x2, the T9 delivers blazing-fast transfer speeds up to 2,000 MB/s, making it ideal for 8K video editing and other demanding tasks.
specification: Carbon-patterned design for a non-slip grip

description: The perfect combination of speed, security, and portability. The T7 is light and pocket-sized, offering fast speeds and data protection with password-enabled hardware encryption. Ideal for storing large files for work or play.
specification: Up to 1,050 MB/s Sequential Read Speed

description: A popular choice for its balance of speed and ruggedness. The SanDisk Extreme V2 provides fast NVMe solid state performance in a portable drive that’s tough enough to take on any adventure.
specification: Up to 1050MB/s read and 1000MB/s write speeds
Handy carabiner loop for securing the drive

product_title: SanDisk Extreme PRO Portable SSD V2 2TB
description: Built for professionals who need uncompromising speed. The Extreme PRO leverages blazing-fast NVMe technology to dramatically increase transfer speeds up to 2000MB/s, housed in a forged aluminum chassis that acts as a heatsink.

A reliable and affordable SSD for your everyday needs. Get solid state performance featuring up to 800MB/s read speeds in a portable drive you can depend on. The durable rubber hook makes it easy to secure.

Crucial's fastest portable SSD, designed for video professionals and creators. The X10 Pro delivers mind-bending 2,100MB/s read speeds, allowing you to edit directly from the drive and accelerate your workflows.
specification: Anodized aluminum body with a soft-touch rubber base

description: The perfect blend of speed and compatibility for photographers and creators. The X9 Pro offers sustained performance of up to 1,050MB/s, plug-and-play compatibility, and robust data protection.
specification: Password protection with 256‐bit AES hardware encryption
Works with Windows, Mac, Android, iPad, PC, and Linux

description: The Crucial X6 lets you store and access your files fast. This tiny drive is incredibly lightweight and provides up to 800MB/s read speed, making it 5.7x faster than traditional hard drives. Perfect for expanding storage on the go.
specification: Tiny, lightweight design (weighs less than your car keys)

description: Designed for high-performance overclocking on a budget. The Vengeance LPX heatspreader is made of pure aluminum for faster heat dissipation, and its low-profile design makes it ideal for small form factor systems.
Engineered for extreme performance on next-gen DDR5 platforms. The Trident Z5 RGB features a sleek and futuristic design with a streamlined light bar, perfect for overclockers and PC enthusiasts.
Optimized and engineered for full compatibility on the latest AMD Ryzen platforms. The Trident Z Neo brings unparalleled memory performance and vibrant RGB lighting to any gaming PC or workstation.
The classic choice for performance and value. The Ripjaws V series is the newest DDR4 memory designed for maximum compatibility and cutting-edge performance with the latest Intel Core processors.
specification: Rigorously tested for reliability and compatibility

description: Designed for extreme performance on next-gen DDR5 platforms. Kingston FURY Renegade features a sleek, newly designed black and silver aluminum heat spreader with a dynamic LED light bar.
specification: FURY Infrared Sync Technology for RGB

description: A high-performance, cost-effective upgrade. FURY Beast DDR4 RGB features Plug N Play automatic overclocking and a stylish low-profile heat spreader with stunning RGB effects.
specification: Ready for AMD Ryzen and Intel XMP

description: The perfect performance upgrade for gamers and PC enthusiasts who want solid performance without the lights. Features a stylish, low-profile heat spreader for effective cooling.

product_title: ASUS ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4090 OC Edition 24GB
description: The ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4090 brings a whole new meaning to going with the flow. Inside and out, every element of the card gives the monstrous GPU headroom to breathe freely and achieve ultimate performance.
specification: Cooling: Patented vapor chamber with massive heatsink
Features: DLSS 3, Axial-tech fans, Aura Sync RGB

product_title: ASUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4070 Ti OC Edition 12GB
description: The ASUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4070 Ti has been redesigned to house the next-gen Ada Lovelace GPU. With military-grade capacitors and robust cooling, it's built TUF for incredible 1440p and 4K gaming performance.

product_title: ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 3060 V2 OC Edition 12GB
description: Delivering the latest NVIDIA Ampere gaming experience in its purest form, the ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 3060 melds performance and simplicity like no other. A great value card for stellar 1080p gaming.

product_title: MSI Gaming X Trio GeForce RTX 4080 16GB

product_title: MSI Ventus 2X Black GeForce RTX 4060 8GB OC
description: Ventus provides a fundamentally solid experience for users looking for a performance graphics card. A sharp-looking updated design with TORX FAN 4.0 lets Ventus breeze through any task.
The AORUS Master is the ultimate choice for enthusiasts. It features the WINDFORCE bionic shark fan cooling system and a unique LCD Edge View to display GPU stats or custom GIFs.

description: The ultimate desktop processor for enthusiasts and hardcore gamers. With 24 cores and a blazing 6.0 GHz max turbo frequency, it delivers top-tier performance for gaming, streaming, and content creation.

description: Hitting the sweet spot for high-end performance, the Core i7-14700K offers a significant core count increase over its predecessor, making it a powerhouse for both gaming and demanding productivity tasks.

description: The go-to processor for mainstream gaming builds. The Core i5-14600K provides excellent performance in the latest titles and everyday applications, offering fantastic value for its price.

description: The productivity king. With 16 high-performance Zen 4 cores, the Ryzen 9 7950X is built to dominate multi-threaded workloads like 3D rendering, video editing, and software compilation.
